website_summaries.verdict: A good silicone whisk product that is firmer than other silicone whisks on the market
pros: The benefits of the regular OXO balloon whisk with a coated tine that won't hurt your non-stick pan coating
Bright red color makes it easy to find in the utensil drawer
cons: The silicone model tends to be a little less firm than its stainless steel OXO counterpart

customer_reviews.title: Unusable after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Silicon layer started peeling. I don't want that anywhere near my food.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: I have looked for a good silicon whisk high and low and could not find ...
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a good silicon whisk high and low and could not find a sturdy one. My other ones had wooden handles and the heads would break off of the handles. I haven’t had any problems with this whisk. I can wash it in the dishwasher and use it in hot pots and pans with no issues. It’s held up great.
customer_reviews.author: quintin

customer_reviews.title: Too much drag
customer_reviews.text: The silicone whisk has a lot of "drag" in liquids. As a result, it is harder to use than a plain wire one. I will only use this for the non-stick cookware that recommends non-metal utensils and prefer a wire one for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the well padded handle and the overall size
customer_reviews.text: a nicely rubber padded handle is wonderful! The whisk is nice and light and it will not scratch your non stick pans. I have several whisks and they are all professional with large Stainless steel handle but I can no longer use them bc they are too heavy for my arthritic hands! This is a great option. the size is perfect as well, not too small or too large. Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Shipe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like to make pan sauces and I was looking for the perfect whisk to use in my non-stick pans. Oxo makes the perfect products to help the home cook. I ordered this in the stainless steel version too. Fits in the hand just right. I hand wash dishes and find it rather simple to clean too. Can't usually go wrong with Oxo products.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy SumnerTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coating & Weight Distribution!
customer_reviews.text: This whisk is weighted ideally. This makes is easy to use, and even easier to clean. Now, if Oxo Good Grips would only come out with a silicone coated French whisk, I might think that I had died and gone to heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Lynyrd

customer_reviews.title: good whisk
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good silicone whisk made by OXO. I really like OXO products because they seem to be better made than most of their competition and they are known for their handles to be more comfortable. If you're looking for a silicone whisk, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley G

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say about this balloon whisk except that it works. I have no complaints. It's been holding up really well. It can be difficult to clean if I don't rinse after I use it. Other than that, it's awesome. I bought it since I bought stainless steel cookware and didn't want my metal wire whisk to scratch them. UPDATE JULY 29, 2013: The silicone is wearing off. I only use this thing to whisk oatmeal or eggs.
customer_reviews.author: World's Okayest Mom

customer_reviews.title: good, reliable whisk. Won't damage bowls, pots, or pans.
customer_reviews.text: After years of using wire whisks that fall apart and scrape and scratch my pans, It's nice to finally have a product that has so far proven to be durable, gentle, and easy to clean. The handle feels great in the hand and prevents fatigue when you're furiously trying to whip something up. I've purchased a couple more of these as gifts for friends that were struggling with crummy whisks with thin handles and loops that would constantly pop out. I would definitely buy more of these and look forward to experimenting with other OXO whisks in different materials and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for making babaganoush!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for making babaganoush. My Israeli cousin said metal should not touch roasted eggplant, so I bought this whisk. The meat of the roasted eggplant remains white when whipped with this whisk, then I add lemon juice, sesame tahini, olive oil and perhaps some garlic, to taste.
customer_reviews.author: EGF

customer_reviews.title: A bit too floppy, but okay
customer_reviews.text: Got this for whisking in my ceramic-coated cookware so I wouldn't damage the surfaces. It works pretty well but the whisking wires (not sure of the proper name) could be a bit stiffer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Bends out of shape
customer_reviews.text: This bend out of shape after first use. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on Magma ceramic-coated cookware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our sailboat. We have some really nice Magma ceramic cookware that I don’t want to scratch so this is perfect! The silicone coating has not peeled yet.....I won’t be putting this in the dishwasher, so I don’t think this will be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: These coated whisks are essential if you have valuable tin-lined copper or ceramic-lined cast iron sauce or sauté pans to avoid damaging the surface. Why spend $150 or $250 on a Le Creuset vessel and then wreck the surface with metal tools?
customer_reviews.author: Philip J. Tramdack

customer_reviews.title: One wire bent out of place drives me crazy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this whisk so that I could make lemon curd without exposing the citrus to a metal whisk, and for that, it does its job. However, one of the outer layers (wires?) is bent out of place which makes it way less sturdy that I would like it to be. Kind of bummed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wires aren’t strong
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wires don’t scratch bowls and make the whisk easy to clean. But this seems to be made out of wires that are more pliable that typical whisks, so it’s a bit floppy. I wouldn’t recommend it if you want to use it to make a meringue or whipped cream by hand.
customer_reviews.author: StefMPLS

customer_reviews.title: Whisk it good!
customer_reviews.text: I had their previous non-stick compatible whisk that was made from nylon and it was flimsy and hard to whisk anything well. This one has fixed all of my complaints! It's a very sturdy wire whisk with a silicone coating that seems to be well done and won't allow food underneath. Exactly what I needed for my non-stick cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've bought silicone types before so I wouldn't scratch my pots, but they were all too flimsy. This one stands up and does almost as good a job as the traditional ones.
customer_reviews.author: ARLENE

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest. Whisk is starting to fall apart after only a couple months. Would not buy again. Expected more from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: The wires are no-where near as stiff as my OXO good grips stainless steel whisk, but overall this is a good product. The ergonomic handle in itself is a good reason to buy either version.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: My first review was poor because I did not find the item in the delivery box. However, since I wrote that, I checked the box again and it was there! Please accept my apology. It looks great, I am looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Andrist

customer_reviews.title: Great to use in fragile pots
customer_reviews.text: Love OXO stuff, never failed yet. This is no exception, sometimes I make yogurt in my Instant Pot using ceramic inner pot and use it to dissolve the starter. This whisk rocks
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P

customer_reviews.title: Not very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you try to mike anything other than milk or eggs this is not the whisk you need, it has no strength and just bends
customer_reviews.author: SeanM

customer_reviews.title: Nice whisk
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice in my hand and works well. I like the wide grip. Overall, the whisk is a bit larger than a standard metal whisk. It is my go-to even in bowls I'm not worried about scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk. Just remember that silicone is very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk. Just remember that silicone is very flimsy, if you expect it to act like a metal whisk you will be disappointed. That being said, this whisk has several more "loops" of silicone, which will make it perform much better than some of the other silicone whisks on Amazon that have only 3-4 loops.
customer_reviews.author: justin phillips

customer_reviews.title: No-scratch, No-stick, No-brainer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whisk so far. I'm always wanting to use silicone whisks so that I don't scratch up my pans. They also clean very easily which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaqy Q.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this whisk! It's 'wires' are well made, well distributed and the most important - perfect for use in or on a non stick surface. This item is well made, as only OXO can do, and is now one of the staples of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: NotSo IdleCuriosity

customer_reviews.title: It’s the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for our family and payed it forward to the mother-in-law! Don’t buy metal again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good for purpose I bought.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for making lemon curd since it's nonreactive. Hope the silicone coating lasts without breaking. Other makers has not
customer_reviews.author: Jopalis

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This whisk is not ideal for heavy whisking. It’s good for dry ingredients because it’s so flimsy. It doesn’t do well incorporating air and doesn’t do well with thick liquids. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: ra2151

customer_reviews.title: coated whisk
customer_reviews.text: works great to keep my new pans from getting scratched
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Provides a great arm workout, without damaging the bowl
customer_reviews.text: Love the ergonomics of the grip since I can use a few different holds with it when my arm gets tired while whipping heavy cream or egg whites. I chose the silicone coating to minimize scratches in my pans and copper bowl, and to delay the possibility of rusting on the tines themselves. Not sure if the performance is reduced because of the silicone coating, though.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I was “whisked away“ by this whisk.
customer_reviews.text: My husband kept using a metal whiskey on our non-stick pans. So I bought this in order to stop the small scratches. Works like a dream. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Bendrix

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this whisk lightly to make pancakes and other such items (over the last month) and the prongs are already popping out of the whisk. Poor quality and over priced. Of course it lasted just long enough that I can no longer return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feel good in your hand
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite whisk. Always wash right away because I know I will be using again and agin
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Oxo always makes great products and this is no exemption. Item feels sturdy. This is now my go to whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Si

customer_reviews.title: Flattened when packed
customer_reviews.text: The product would be great, if it had not been flattened fit in a box one inch thick. I tried to bend it back and it is still deformed, not a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, well-made, no scratching on any of the stainless steel bowls
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mixer. All the Oxo products I've used seem to be well made. The handle and the beater are well constructed. Easy to clean and unlike stainless steel, it doesn't scratch the bowls
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great for cooking in my easily - scratched cookware. They are also great for baking, or anything else for which you need a whisk.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Non scratch yet still very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Small but I do like it’s non scratch yet the wires are still thin enough to whip very well. Many other plastic whisks are too fat to do the work of a wire whisk. But I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: GaryS

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a "stainless" stell whisk that had started to rust. Ugh. The silicon coating makes it resistant to that problem and makes it super easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: Great for nonstick
customer_reviews.text: New skillets and we all try to make that nonstick last.
customer_reviews.author: jeff w

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn’t scratch nonstick surfaces, easy to clean too! It’s between 9-11inches I think, so standard size. We bought two.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent whisk!
customer_reviews.text: Love Oxo products. So much better than Walmart Mainstay rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: T. Estrick

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fork!
customer_reviews.text: I was one of those people who used forks instead of whisks. Does the same job right? Wrong! I was making pancakes with my new whisk and it was all blended so well with barely any effort! My pancakes came out super fluffy. It has a solid handle and has a good feel to it. I absolutely love the silicone and this guy is a such great quality. Highly, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: ashleydottir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pans.  Will not scratch
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk. Came very quickly and I really like the handle. Fits my hand well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great whip
customer_reviews.text: Best whip I have used. Easy to clean, good purchase
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Grip
customer_reviews.text: Great grip especially for small hands. Perfect for my pots and pans that require non metal wisking.
customer_reviews.author: michelep

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Work for Non-Stick Surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent choice for those non stick pans you do not want to scratch! We use it with our Al-Clad frying pan. Dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good Whisk!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of non-stick pans and needed a whisk that was safe to use on them. OXO products have never failed me and this is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best Whisk
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a silicone whisk that wouldn't fall apart after 1 use and this one is it. I have used this whisk multiple times and it has not had any problems. I love this whisk and will probably buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: SnowDragon06

customer_reviews.title: bendlng
customer_reviews.text: the wire is too isn't too sturdy enough. good to use in loose batter or potatoes. cleans up easy
customer_reviews.author: zip

customer_reviews.title: oxo whisk
customer_reviews.text: This whisk works well, it's smaller than I expected but it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: crafty

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I really like this whisk but the handle isn't as ergonomic as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Myrlande

customer_reviews.title: Not Cheap - But Works Extremely Well
customer_reviews.text: Wife requested this silicon-coated wire whisk. Said it's worked "perfectly" for last two months.
customer_reviews.author: JMKrass

customer_reviews.title: Started coming apart, had to get a different whisk
customer_reviews.text: The rubber coating on one of the whisks started to come off at the base where it connects to the handle, exposing the wire, and then the wire would pop out from the handle all the time. There is another wisk on amazon (and also at bed, bath and beyond) which is similar to this for half the price, which I now use with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: joobus

customer_reviews.title: ... scrath up my expensive cookware so OXO was a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a silicone wisk as I prefer not to scrath up my expensive cookware so OXO was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: I like this wisk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wisk! I have a older cheap one that is all bent. This one so far has been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: boggydawggy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a must have if you cook with non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I always buy OXO vs other brand whenever possible, their products are always well designed and built with quality materials. This product is no different. I'm sure it will last for years to come. Of course it is as functional as any other whisk out there, except this one won't scratch your non-stick pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Thinner and less flexible than what I was thinking for silicone. Also arrived bent.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wismer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality which I have come to expect from Oxo. Very nice whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Cadybug

customer_reviews.title: Little better wisk
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Better quality and handling comfort. We'll see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Far West

customer_reviews.title: Oxo never Disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We love oxo products. This whisk is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra N Irby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily in my palm & was a terrific replacement for my old wire whisk.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean - Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes these so much that I bought a second one in 11" and another in 9". They don't scratch her coated pans and are very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hughett

customer_reviews.title: Good OXO Quality. A Little Shorter Than I Like.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, as expected from OXO. This one's a little too short for my liking, but at least it isn't one of those spineless silicone whisks. It'll do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Boisean

customer_reviews.title: Love this whisk!
customer_reviews.text: Love this whisk! I purchased this whisk for nonstick cookware and find I use it ALL the time!
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: After 30 washes, the color still pops!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's a lil more than a cheap whisk but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: AHW777

customer_reviews.title: Great product terrible color
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, but it’s not clear why it needs to be offered in red. Clashes with all my utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Treeguy

customer_reviews.title: Non Stick is Where its At
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering WHISKy. very disappointed to discover only a whisk. SO we gave it to my mother-in-law. Who now has whisk marks next to the spatula marks.
customer_reviews.author: MuffaloMoose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be of good quality. Won't scratch non-stick surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. DuBois, PA

customer_reviews.title: Great for instant pot yogurt
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my instant pot yogurt making. Works perfectly, just the right length.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: OXO is a great brand. One of my favorites for kitchen items
customer_reviews.text: OXO is a great brand. One of my favorites for kitchen items. Long lasting and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Hicat

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted. Wish it came I. Different colors
customer_reviews.author: Natalie480

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a Calphalon Silicon Wisk and it had started flopping around so badly that I couldn't really get a good whisking action on my non-stick pans. This whisk is sturdy, usable for my non-stick pans, and well-priced.
customer_reviews.author: aby6706

customer_reviews.title: Still in One piece
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I have only used this item four times and after being cleaned in the dishwasher, it still is in one piece. The silicone is soft and hasn't came apart from the whisk. Hopefully, it will continue to last.
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy unlike most silicone whisks and safe to use with non stick cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Triston Cross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ceramic cookware
customer_reviews.text: I got this whisk for my ceramic coated cookware which scratches if you use metal utensils on it. It's held up really well. Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: The top piece can shift a little and have to place back on top but other wise great product.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to anyone kitchen. Feels very comfortable in the hand and clean up is amazing. Handles the dishwasher just fine, no more rust or hard to remove food.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Whisk.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sturdy material and I like that the handle does not get too hot to touch. Doesn’t harm your Teflon or ceramic pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Required for non-stick pots
customer_reviews.text: It is really a problem to use a metal whisk in a non-stick pot/pan when trying to make a sauce, since it can damage the pot's coating. This whisk solves the problem nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sisty

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice whisk and safe for those non-stick pans. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This has been a handy dandy little who gadget. It stirs the pot like a brother in law that had too much to drink on Thanksgiving! It is really easy to clean too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John the Revelator

customer_reviews.title: nice grip and non-scratch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grip and great non abrasive red loops make this a great balloon whisk for my ceramic non stick pans. RATING: 5 Scambled eggs
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whisk and will likely be purchasing more. It works great on my nonstick cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it is vinyl coated. Will not scratch coating on pots. When making something that has to be stirred over heat, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Rainer

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far, but have only used it twice. It has a light feel to it, like it is floating on air when used.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about another silicone whisk, but this one stands out!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kempton

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Whisks without scratching non stick. So far the plastic hasn't worn off the core. Had it for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: The handle will let you beat it (beat it) as long as needed
customer_reviews.text: Don't you make me repeat it. A huge improvement over the old metal wish we were previously using.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID A REYNOLDS JR

customer_reviews.title: Wore out
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk but the silicone wore off and now I have to replace it. A little expensive for something that didn't last even two years,
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good whisk
customer_reviews.text: The whisk appears to be very well-made, and does it's job as well as any whisk can. I still love my all-time egg beaters however. I use this to make roux in my nonstick pan.
customer_reviews.author: Debbworld

customer_reviews.title: Overall works what it's intended for
customer_reviews.text: Overall works great. If anything wish it had a longer handle
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Camenisch

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my utensils.
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to my silicone utensils. Lighter than expected. Used it only twice, hope it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Got Another
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first whisk so much, I had to get another. Best whisk every. You can't go wrong with this quality whisk!
customer_reviews.author: Bombastus64

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but very flexible when using
customer_reviews.text: Works and we will certainly use it when cooking with non-stick pans. However, it is very, very flexible and when used in a bowl for whisking you end up with food all over the place. So definitely not intended to be used to replace your metal whisks. But is good for those small whisking projects that you need in a non-stick pan.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great whisk, well built and hasn't torn up any pans at all.
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyLogician

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it said it was and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: RAJ

customer_reviews.title: OXO quality and construction
customer_reviews.text: Good size for deep pot stirring. Comfortable handle is easy to grip and does not heat up while in use. Attractive color and design
customer_reviews.author: treehugger

product_meta.title: OXO 1244780 Good Grips 11-Inch Better Silicone Balloon Whisk,Red/Black,1EA
product_meta.description:
Size:1 EA| Color:Red/BlackThe OXO good grips 11-inch silicone balloon whisk features heat resistant silicone (up to 600of) and a teardrop shaped handle that fits comfortably in the palm of your hand. The soft handle won’t slip out of your hand, even when wet. Beat eggs, stir batter, whip cream and stir sauces in Comfort. The silicone will not discolor, warp or melt and is safe for non-stick, ceramic and metal cookware.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Silicone is heat resistant up to 600f
Gentle and safe for non-stick, ceramic and metal cookware
